name: Amar Kutir Society for Rural Development
briefDescription: Amar Kutir Society for Rural Development is located in Birbhum, West Bengal. Presently the society is engaged in skill building of the artisans of Batik print and leather work with new technology. Amar Kutir Society For Rural Development funds 25% of its profit for programs in health, education, and environment to strengthen the neighborhoods communities in a holistic way. Three areas of its interest for expansion includes Environment , Training and Medical clinics.
